definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
coaxial circular arc/concentric arc (in spherical geometry)

sentences.english: Button on the side of the plane or edge for a smooth transition for the arc-shaped.
sentences.chinese: 按鈕的側面棱邊可爲平面或爲圓弧狀的平滑過渡。

sentences.english: Circular interpolation of time-sharing algorithm is that circular arc is approached with tangent or chord line.
sentences.chinese: 時間分割法圓弧插補用切線或絃線來逼近圓弧。

sentences.english: Circular interpolation of time-sharing algorithm is that circular arc is approached with tangent or chord line.
sentences.chinese: 時間分割法圓弧插補用切線或絃線來逼近圓弧。

sentences.english: In this paper, the method for the calculation of surface fatigue strength of W N gears is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討了雙圓弧齒輪接觸疲勞極限的計算方法。

sentences.english: A new type of arc cycloidal internal meshing rotary pump was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對一種新型圓弧擺線內齧合轉子泵進行了研究。

sentences.english: An algorithm for data approximation with global optimal biarc spline is presented in this article.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用整體最優雙圓弧樣條擬合離散數據點的算法。

sentences.english: The are of the couple curve of the mechanism is made use of to control the length of dwell time.
sentences.chinese: 利用機構連桿曲線上的圓弧段來控制停頓時間的長短。

sentences.english: Keep poit arc and 90 degree plate, no hurt to right-angle.
sentences.chinese: 可保留印刷上圓弧角及自動裝版的90度直角。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a simple method of curving angle steel arc.
sentences.chinese: 介紹角鐵彎制圓弧的簡易方法。

sentences.english: The moulding characteristics of plastic water-tap were analyzed, and core pulling in circular arc trace was applied to the tap.
sentences.chinese: 分析塑料水龍頭的成型特點，採用了圓弧抽芯。

sentences.english: The skull is slightly rounded, allowing for a round and forward looking eye.
sentences.chinese: 略微圓拱，允許向眼睛方向呈圓弧形。

sentences.english: One is that the peak profile of rotor is circular arc and the valley is it's conjugate curve.
sentences.chinese: 其二，轉子谷形爲圓弧，而其峯形爲它的共軛曲線。

sentences.english: An analytical method is developed to study the sheltering effect on arc-shaped bot tom-mounted breakwaters.
sentences.chinese: 給出了圓弧型貫底式防波堤防浪效果計算的解析方法。

sentences.english: The invention provides a circular arc tooth cycloid rotor-typed engine structure, in particular to a circular arc tooth cycloid rotor engine.
sentences.chinese: 本發明係一種圓弧齒擺線轉子式發動機的結構。

sentences.english: Fit for chamfering irregular shape and arc work piece.
sentences.chinese: 可用不規則形狀及圓弧形狀加工件使用。

definition: to bore a hole/to drill/drilled hole
